paragraphs: Front end software engineer looking to continue growing in this industry, wherever that may be.
I have experience planning, estimating, building, testing, and shipping features end to end - this was my day-to-day both at Microsoft Teams Rooms and the EA FC Companion App.

As a Software Engineer, my responsibilities include meeting with product managers and feature owners, exchanging feedback with UX designers, coordinating manual+automated test plans with QA, and monitoring releases with both off-the-shelf and bespoke tooling.
I've worked with React (both functional and legacy), custom Javascript, and C# UI in the past.
